summary:
The Security Council, 
Noting Judge Nawaf Salam's resignation from the International Court of Justice, effective 14 January 2025, 
Noting a vacancy has occurred for the remainder of Judge Salam's term, 
Noting the date of the election to fill the vacancy shall be fixed by the Security Council as per article 14 of the Statute, 
Decides the election to fill the vacancy shall take place on 27 May 2025 at a meeting of the Security Council and the General Assembly at its seventy-ninth session.
